summary: Mod That Makes Honeyside Garden Better And Adds New Room. Trophy Room
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i442/EpizMakeboyy/Skyrim/HSI.jpg[/img]

Sorry about those pictures. They arent in right order because I have more than 5 pics so I needed to add those later and it messed up these things.

*****************
[u][size=15]Description[/size][/u]
*****************
 Are you ever wanted more weapon and armor space to Honeyside ? Are you ever wanted Display cases ? If you are this is mod for you. And the place looks empy because its your armory/trophy room so I didnt fill it with any items, execpt few for furnishing.
[list] 
Adds
=====
[*] New Room
[*] 4-Mannequins
[*] 8-Weapon Racks
[*] 4-Display Cases
[*] 3-Safes
[*] Several Weapon Plaques
[*] 1-Hidden Treasure...
And more....



*******************************************************
[u]Installing[/u]
*******************************************************


=================================
[u]Installing With Nexus Mod Manager[/u]
=================================
[*] Step.1 Click Download With NMM

[*] Step.2 Enable it with NMM

[*] Step.3 Enjoy! Please Give Feedback and remember to Endorse :)

_________________________________


=================================
[u]Installing Without NMM[/u]
=================================

[*] Step.1 Click Download

[*] Step.2 Extract *HoneysideImprovement.rar* with 7Zip or WinRAR

[*] Step.3 Open Data and drag ESP file to = The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data

[*] Step.4 Enjoy! Please Give Feedback and remember to Endorse :)


*******************************************************
[u][color=red]Good To Know[/color][/u]
*******************************************************


==================================
[u]Compatibility[/u]
==================================

All Mods what doesnt change Honeyside Garden Or Interior

==================================
[u]Bugs[/u]
==================================
You cant place any DG(Dawnguard) Stuff on Plaques or any kind swords to Shield+2wepons Plaque. 
I dont know why is that, but I tried to copy, make and adjust those Plaques but nothing seems to help.
And so I recommend to save before placing things there first time because Ghostblade Etc. Cant be placed
to Plaques or Racks. (Skyrim Bug.. Not my mod) So there is no big bugs that you should be worried,
but if you face any bugs that should be worried just tell...


========================================================================
[u]Credits[/u]
========================================================================

[b]Bethesda for creating Skyrim, and Skyrim Nexus for this awesome site[/b]



[/list]
author: Makezi
